T02TD3161E:181a-1: padma narte shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD3161E:181a-3: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3161E:181a-4: sngar bshad pa'i tshogs stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rdzas la sna tshogs padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge hr'i: dkar po rnam par bsam zhing /
T02TD3161E:181a-5: de yongs su gyur pa las kyang padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi gdams ngag rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02TD3161E:181a-6: zhal gcig phyag bco brgyad skyil krung phyed pa snang ba mtha' yas dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang ldan pa /
T02TD3161E:181a-7: phyag thams cad kyis sna tshogs padma bsnams pa //
T02TD3161E:181a-8: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02TD3161E:181a-9: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs na sgrol ma dang ni nor bzangs dang khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin ngas pa /
T02TD3161E:181a-10: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bz'a mnga' ba'o //
T02TD3161E:181a-11: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ba yang /
T02TD3161E:181a-12: aom hr'i: padma narte shva ra h'um /
T02TD3161E:181a-13: nad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phan yon chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD3161E:181a-14: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD3161E:181a-16: // / mkhas pa ratna a'a ka ra'i zhal snga nas tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
